thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com
thread.title: Pat Schaeffer
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Pat Schaeffer

author: Pat Schaeffer
title: Pat Schaeffer
text:
This is my first time to use Frames Direct. I was skeptical since I have used other mail order glasses in the past and was not very happy with them. I used my own Maui Jim frames and I am so happy with the lens and they made my old frames look like new!!! (Did I mention the cost was half of what my eye care doctor Quote: d?) They were returned in just under two weeks. Proffessional assistant Nellie was awesome. Thank you for being so professional and helpful. I will use Frames Direct again and suggest to all my friends.
Pat
